The game: 
 The goal of the game is to guess a word. 
 The player choses a letter by clicking the letters on the bottom of the screen. 
 If the guessed letter is a part of the solution it will replace on of the lines in the solution on the top of the screen.
 If a wrong letter is guessed, the stick-man drawing gets updated and you get one less try. 
 You win if all correct letters are guessed before the drawing is finished. 
 You lose if the drawing is complete before you have guessed all correct letters. 
 
 Change language: 
 The language can be changed under the settings field.
